name: Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Web Test Build
name_original: Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Web Test Build
description:
Control
W - Up
S - Down
A - Left
D - Right 
J - A
K - B
Ctrl - Select
Enter - Start

You can download the gb. file and play it on emulator here https://hannorsmith.itch.io/tbhkgb-test-build

Throw the Emulator away! Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun Gameboy Edition Web Test Build allows you to play this game direcly on itch.io!

The Gameboy game based on an manga/anime "Toilet Bound Hanako-Kun (A.K.A. Jibaku Shounen Hanako-Kun)" Still in development. Some assets in game might get replace later. There’s nothing much in the test build, but I will keep adding important stuff!

If you found bugs, problems or suggestions, DM me at @HanakoKun_GB in Twitter, or send me an e-mail at hanakokungameboy@gmail.com

Original manga/anime by Aidairo 

Game by Hannor Smith
